title: Get Help from Auntie Ethel
content:
s going to bring her husband back from the dead. This will give you the following dialogue options.

Because of Auntie Ethel. You nearly died! Don't be naive - a hag was never going to help you. Hags don't work for free. What did you promise her? Are you done whining yet?

Choosing dialogue 3 will have Mayrina explain that she gave up her child in exchange for her husband.

You were going to trade your baby for your dead husband? With hags, nothing is ever over. A life for a life - you must real
